el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=1 rooms_high=1
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world(levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-hay")
set_stone("st-greenbrown", 3, 5)

set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 1) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 2) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 3) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 4) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 5) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 6) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 7) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 8) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 9) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 10) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 11) set_stone("st-brownie", 0, 12)
oxyd(1,2) oxyd(1,4) oxyd(1,6) oxyd(1,7) oxyd(1,9) oxyd(1,11) oxyd(1,1) oxyd(18,1) oxyd_shuffle()
fakeoxyd(1,3) fakeoxyd(1,5) fakeoxyd(1,8) fakeoxyd(1,10)
abyss(7,7) abyss(7,8) abyss(7,9) abyss(12,1) abyss(10,11) abyss(12,2) abyss(13,3) abyss(12,3) abyss(9,5) abyss(11,6)
abyss(7,11) abyss(13,9)
set_stone("st-death", 10, 8) set_stone("st-death", 10, 9)
set_stone("st-death", 19, 12) set_stone("st-death", 18, 12) set_stone("st-death", 17, 12) set_stone("st-death", 19, 11) set_stone("st-death", 19, 10)
abyss(2,0) abyss(2,12)
set_stone("st-death", 5, 2) set_stone("st-death", 5, 3) set_stone("st-death", 5, 1) set_stone("st-death", 5, 7) set_stone("st-death", 5, 8) set_stone("st-death", 5, 9) set_stone("st-death", 5, 10) set_stone("st-death", 5, 11) set_stone("st-death", 5, 12) set_stone("st-greenbrown", 5, 6) set_stone("st-greenbrown", 5, 4) set_stone("st-door", 5, 5 , {name="door2", type="v"})
mytimer = 0 --x=-20 --y=0 function timer_handler() mytimer=mytimer+1 if mytimer==1 then x=20 y=20 end if mytimer==2 then x=-20 y=-20 end if mytimer==3 then x=20 y=-20 end if mytimer==4 then x=0 y=0 x=-20 y=20 SendMessage("door2", "openclose") mytimer=0 end enigma.AddConstantForce(x,y) end
set_stone( "st-timer", 0, 0, {action="callback", target="timer_handler"})
set_actor("ac-blackball" ,17.5, 2)
